intro: Lampranthus plenus, commonly known as the "Rainbow Sunset" or "Fairy Lantern," is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, known for its diverse and often striking floral displays. The plant features fleshy, ribbed stems and produces vibrant, showy flowers in shades of red, orange, and yellow. Its blooming period typically occurs during the summer months, attracting pollinators such as bees and butterflies. Lampranthus plenus is well adapted to arid environments, storing water in its thick leaves and stems.
